title: Print, "Costume Design for Black Knight, for Checkmate", 1937
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: E. Mcknight Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left: silver t[...]ing; right: white discs; right margin: silver hair and black / all as long as horse[...]; in black ink, lower right: Black Knight "Checkmate"
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Costume design in black and silver for knight. Man looks to the left with his arm raised. His helmet in the shape of a horse’s head. silver horse hair tassels stream from his helmet and sleeves of his tunic; he also wears tights in black and silver.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Costume Design for Black Knight, for Checkmate", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-279.
